ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: MdGW contribution was made under the framework of the research platforms RP-PCP ( https://www.rp-pcp.org/) and GREASE ( https://www.grease-network.org/).

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This work was supported by the World Health Organization, acting through the Special Programme for Research and Training in Tropical Diseases.
